1534040.name: Baby Racer
1534040.description:
This Game offer multiplayer mode where you can play whit your friends and enjoy the real racing thrill.

Multiplayer mode comes with,
Custom room - where you can play with your friends to specific room.
Matchmaking - play race with random people.


Baby racer provide you a exciting experience of racing.
In this game you can play as baby who is ready for race and ready to win.
This game provide you in total of 13 races.

This game offer three different types of racing track such as
Ocean Track
Desert Track
Snow Track
You get three race on each track.
And one special long race for each track. In which you get chance to play race consists of all three race at once competing with more difficult enemy AI.

Game offers you two different types of vehicles such as
Bicycle
Tricycle
In long race you can even chose between them.

Game even offers you some amazing function in race such as
Nitro's with nitro's function your vehicle get good boost in acceleration which increase your vehicle speed and help you win game.
Milk boost with milk boost you will get little boost in acceleration of vehicle.
Milk spray with milk spray you can distract enemy player for few sec and get lead in race.
You have to collect Milk bottles in race to use both milk boost and milk spray function. And enemy can also use those function.
